ei.agent.enterpriseagent
Class EnterpriseAgent

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.Agent
      ei.EIAgent
          ei.agent.enterpriseagent.EnterpriseAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnactmentEnterpriseAgent
public class EnterpriseAgent
extends EIAgent

Base class for implementing agents representing enterprises (the users of the platform). An EnterpriseAgent's business is composed of two parts:

  • competences: what it is able to supply to the market
  • needs: what it needs to go on with its business
In this class, the agent already includes the ability to:
  • request negotiations to a negotiation mediator using the QF-negotiation protocol
  • participate as a responder in an interest manifestation protocol
  • enter into negotiations of the QF-negotiation protocol (acting as a responder), possibly using a q-negotiation strategy
  • participate as a responder in a contract-signing protocol (for signing contracts it has previously negotiated)
Each EnterpriseAgent will subscribe the Normative Environment for reports concerning his contracts. The class includes a method handleNEReport that allows programmers to implement appropriate responses for reports coming from the Normative Environment.

See Also:
Serialized Form

setup

protected void setup()
Description copied from class: EIAgent
This setup method:
  • iterates through the arguments provided to the agent to build the Properties object accordingly
  • registers the SL and Leap languages
  • registers the ei-management ontology
  • generates the public/private key pair for this agent
  • creates a responder behaviour for the EI_MANAGEMENT_ONTOLOGY
When extending this class, override this method to create agent behaviour(s) and invoke super.setup().

Overrides:
setup in class EIAgent

takeDown

protected void takeDown()
When terminating, unsubscribes from the Normative Environment for every standing contract.

Overrides:
takeDown in class EIAgent

clearCompetences

protected void clearCompetences()
Clears the competences of this agent. Unregisters the services from the DF.

updateRegistrationWithDF

protected void updateRegistrationWithDF()
Updates this agent registration with the DF. If the agent has some need, registers as buyer. If the agent has some competences, registers as seller of those competences.

handleNEReport

public void handleNEReport(Report rep)
This method is invoked when a report is received from the Normative Environment. Each EnterpriseAgent subscribes the Normative Environment for reports regarding each of its contracts. Programmers that which to do something when such a report is received may implement this method.

Parameters:
rep - The report received from the Normative Environment
